summary: This mod was originally created for my personal use but i then decided why not share to the world so here we have Lizardman Derpy Eyes he was my character but i decided i wanted to make a new one but didn\'t want to discard him so i made him a follower
descriptionHtml:
This mod was originally created for my personal use but i then decided why not share to the world. So here we have Lizardman Derpy Eyes he was my character but i decided i wanted to make a new one but didn\'t want to discard him so i made him a follower so now you to can adventure with the Lord of the Derpy family himself enjoy :)

You can find him near the statue of Talos in Whiterun.

To install just put the file in the Data folder.
author: TheEccentricWolf
